mapper.sql: id, img, postion, name, description, salary, create_at, update_at
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM student order by salary desc LIMIT 4
mapper.insert: insert into student (id, img, postion, name, description, salary, create_at, update_at) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salary,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into student
id,
img,
postion,
name,
description,
salary,
create_at,
update_at,

mapper.update:
update student
img = #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
postion = #{postion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
salary = #{salary,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_at = #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_at = #{updateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update student set img = #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, postion = #{postion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, salary = #{salary,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_at = #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_at = #{updateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
